name: HENTAI SNIPER: Middle East
description:
HENTAI SNIPER: Middle East

In this first-person sniper shooter our special H.E.N.T.A.I. Agent has received the most dangerous and difficult task possible: clear out the ruins of once city from terrorists.


STORY

There is nothing left of what was once a city. Nowadays it is an abandoned, heavily guarded by terrorists territory. Not once before we were able to come this close to their base. This is our best chance to fight them back.. for the H.E.N.T.A.I.!

KEY FEATURES

  • Shooting game based on sniper mechanics
  • User-friendly and simple controls
  • A variety of satisfying animations

Wishlist the game and be the first one to win the terrorists over!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1190110/HENTAI_SNIPER_Middle_East/
